articles.description: Scotland face Hungary at Euro 2024 with history on the line. Tom English sets the scene for an epic encounter.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'Scotland face destiny as Hungary decider looms'

articles.description: Afghanistan claim historic first win over Australia to keep their hopes of reaching the T20 World Cup semi-finals alive.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Afghanistan shock Australia to keep semi-final hopes alive

articles.description: Preview, team news, permutations and predictions as Scotland prepare to face Hungary in UEFA Euro 2024.
articles.title: Scotland vs Hungary: UEFA Euro 2024 - Preview, team news, permutations & predictions

articles.description: Sha'Carri Richardson wins the women's 100m in world-leading time at the US Olympic trials to secure her place at this summer's Games in Paris.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Sha'Carri Richardson secures Team USA spot with world's fastest 100m of year

articles.description: Katie Ledecky makes history at the US Olympic swim trials and will chase more records at the Paris Games.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Katie Ledecky heading to Games after making US swim trials history

articles.description: Fans invading the pitch at Euro 2024 is "a concern" says Portugal manager Roberto Martinez after their victory over Turkey.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Roberto Martinez 'concerned' as pitch invaders seek Cristiano Ronaldo selfies

articles.description: Former Wales defender Ashley Williams says Rob Page - sacked as the national team manager on Friday - has been a "victim of Wales' success".
articles.title: Euro 2024: Ashley Williams on Rob Page's sacking as Wales manager

articles.description: Adam Wharton says he can be Kalvin Phillips' replacement in Gareth Southgate's England midfield at Euro 2024.
articles.title: England at Euro 2024: Adam Wharton 'ready' to fill Kalvin Phillips role

articles.description: Lando Norris says it took “an amazing lap, my best lap by a long way” to finally take a pole position for McLaren this year.
articles.title: Spanish Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris says pole was 'my best lap by long way'

articles.description: Chelsea's new Brazilian signing Estevao Willian has been likened to Neymar and Lionel Messi.
articles.title: Chelsea: Estevao Willian has been compared to Neymar and Lionel Messi
